There exists now a new nanodash platform: <https://nanodash.knowledgepixels.com/>. For this platform you also need to make a new introduction nanopub (Go to <https://nanodash.knowledgepixels.com/profile> and do the **Recommended Actions**). Please send the nanopub URI to me (\@mabablue) in [MatterMost](https://meet.gofair.foundation/) so that I can approve it.
